Body: Qaf. By the Glorious Qur'an (Thou art Allah's Apostle). 4939 4940
And tall (and stately) palm-trees with shoots of fruit-stalks piled one over another 4949

As sustenance for (Allah's) Servants; and We give (new) life
			therewith to land that is dead: Thus will be the Resurrection.
Before them was denied (the Hereafter) by the people of Noah the Companions of the Rass the Thamud 4950
The `Ad Pharaoh the Brethren of Lut

The companions of the Wood and the people of Tubba; each one (of
			them) rejected the apostles and My warning was duly fulfilled (in
			them).
Were We then weary with the first Creation that they should be in confused doubt about a new Creation? 4951
It was We who created man and We know what dark suggestions his soul makes to him: for We are nearer to him than (his) jugular vein. 4952
Behold two (guardian angels) appointed to learn (his doings) learn (and note them) one sitting on the right and one on the left. 4953
Not a word does he utter but there is a sentinel by him ready (to note it). 4954
And the stupor of death will bring truth (before his eyes): "This was the thing which thou wast trying to escape!" 4955
But they wonder that there has come to them a Warner from among themselves. So the Unbelievers say: "This is a wonderful thing! 4941
And the Trumpet shall be blown: that will be the Day whereof warning (had been given). 4956
And there will come forth every soul: with each will be an (angel) to drive and an (angel) to bear witness. 4957
(It will be said:) "Thou wast heedless of this; now have We removed thy veil and sharp is thy sight this Day!" 4958
And his companion will say: "Here is (his record) ready with me!" 4959
(The sentence will be:) "Throw throw into Hell every contumacious Rejector (of Allah)! 4960

"Who forbade what was good transgressed all bounds cast doubts
			and suspicions;

"Who set up another god besides Allah: throw him into a severe
			Penalty."
His companion will say: "Our Lord! I did not make him transgress but he was (himself) far astray." 4961 4962 4963
He will say: "Dispute not with each other in My Presence: I had already in advance sent you Warning. 4964 4965
"The Word changes not before Me and I do not the least injustice to My Servants." 4966
"What! when we die and become dust (shall we live again?). That is a (sort of) Return far (from our understanding)." 4942
One Day We will ask Hell "art thou filled to the full?" It will say "are there any more (to come)?" 4967
And the Garden will be brought nigh to the righteous no more a thing distant. 4968
(A voice will say:) "This is what was promised for you for everyone who turned (to Allah) in sincere repentance who kept (his law). 4969
"Who feared (Allah) Most Gracious unseen and brought a heart turned in devotion (to Him): 4970
"Enter ye therein in Peace and Security; this is a Day of Eternal Life!" 4971
There will be for them therein all that they wish and more besides in Our Presence. 4972
But how many generations before them did We destroy (for their Sins) stronger in power than they? Then did they wander through the land: Was there any place of escape (for them)? 4973
Verily in this is a Message for any that has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and earnestly witnesses (the truth). 4974
We created the heavens and the earth and all between them in Six Days nor did any sense of weariness touch Us. 4975 4976 4977
Bear then with patience all that they say and celebrate the praises of thy Lord before the rising of the sun and before (its) setting 4978
We already know how much of them the earth takes away: with Us is a Record guarding (the full account). 4943
And during part of the night (also) celebrate His praises and (so likewise) after the postures of adoration. 4979
And listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place quite near 4980 4981
The day when they will hear a (mighty) Blast in (very) truth): that will be the day of Resurrection. 4982

Verily it is We Who give Life and Death; and to Us is the Final
			Goal--
The Day when the Earth will be rent asunder from (men) hurrying out: that will be a gathering together quite easy for Us. 4983 4984
We know best what they say; and thou art not one to ever awe them by force. So admonish with the Qur'an such as fear My Warning! 4985
But they deny the truth when it comes to them: So they are in a confused state. 4944
Do they not look at the sky above them? How We have made it and adorned it and there are no flaws in it? 4945
And the earth--We have spread it out and set thereon mountains standing firm and produced therein every kind of beautiful growth (in pairs) 4946 4947
To be observed and commemorated by every devotee turning (to Allah). 4948

And We send down from the sky Rain charged with blessing and We
			produce therewith Gardens and Grain for harvests;
